element.name: Comment
element.value: Source: LOK Dungeon Tileset 1.04 Full by Danmar (Placeables only extracted) modified by SBird for CEP

element.name: Comment
element.value:
This hidden pass will jump the user and any companions to a waypoint with the tag "WP_" plus the tag you give this placeable sarcophagus.
example:
tag of sarcophagus now is "tb_hidden_pass". make waypoint tag "WP_tb_hidden_pass".
(never change the script, only the tag.)

element.name: Comment
element.value:
To be used with The Krit's fixes for the CEP adaptation of Demigog's "2nd Edition Style" demilich.
This placeable represents a resting demilich and should not be used outside the demilich scripts.
This is the placeable that used to be usable as a resting demilich, but that is no longer the case. However, Pile of Bones that were placed under CEP 2.0 -- and not updated -- will function as expected. (This placeable can be made to function as the older placeables by giving it zep_demi_bone_hb as a heartbeat function, but this is not recommended.)
See the demilich creature comments for more details.
